devdoc.details: Token router to swap between the market token and the stable token

SafeCastOverflowedIntToUint(int256).details: An int value doesn't fit in an uint of `bits` size.

SafeCastOverflowedUintToInt(uint256).details: An uint value doesn't fit in an int of `bits` size.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

MarketTokenBought(address,address,addres.details: Emitted when the market token is purchased for the stable token

params.marketTokenAddress: The address of the market token contract
params.marketTokenReturned: The amount of the market token received
params.recipient: The address of the recipient of the market token
params.sender: The sender of the stable token
params.stableTokenAddress: The amount of the stable token being spent
params.stableTokenAmount: The amount of the stable token being spent

MarketTokenSold(address,address,address,.details: Emitted when the market token is sold for the stable token

params.marketTokenAddress: The address of the market token contract
params.marketTokenAmount: The amount of the market token spent
params.recipient: The address of the recipient of the stable token
params.sender: The sender of the market token
params.stableTokenReturned: The amount of the stable token received

params.marketStablePool_: The address of the pool contract for the token        pair
params.marketToken_: The address of the POW1 token
params.stableToken_: The address of the stable token

uniswapV3SwapCallback(int256,int256,byte.details: See {IUniswapV3SwapCallback-uniswapV3SwapCallback} This function is called to the sender after a swap is executed on Uniswap V3. The pool tokens owed for the swap must be payed. The caller of this method must be checked to be a UniswapV3Pool deployed by the canonical UniswapV3Factory. amount0Delta and amount1Delta can both be 0 if no tokens were swapped.
